author: Anonymous Helix
title: Check expect for helper
question:
Hi, 
I have a test that is failing at the next-ball function after I wrote the helper function. 
I copied it to check whether it will also fail at the helper function itself, but it passed there, so what can be the reason that a test fails at the tick function?
Where should I look for an error?
Thanks.
student_answer: Read through what the next-ball function expects and does. Your logic is probably incorrect somewhere.
